meanings.sent1: Her concertgoings brought her joy and excitement.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy my concertgoings at the local music venue.
meanings.sent3: His concertgoings always involve singing along loudly.
meanings.sent4: The city's concertgoings lit up the night with music.
meanings.sent5: The concertgoings filled the air with melodies and cheers.

meanings.definition: The behavior or activities associated with attending concerts.
meanings.sent1: Their concertgoings include buying merchandise and taking photos.
meanings.sent2: The concertgoings of the fans added to the lively atmosphere.
meanings.sent3: At the concert, their concertgoings included dancing and clapping.
meanings.sent4: The concertgoings of the crowd created a symphony of sounds.
meanings.sent5: The concertgoings of the group made the event unforgettable.
